MyFrontier App Redesign

A complete mobile app redesign that simplified navigation and introduced motion patterns for a more intuitive experience.

Client
Frontier
Role
Associate Design Director
Agency
Razorfish
Year
2024
Autopay sign-ups
+22%

The MyFrontier app was overdue for a refresh to improve usability and align with Frontier’s modernized brand. The redesign simplified the interface, improved navigation, and introduced motion to create a more intuitive, polished experience.

Approach

As an Associate Design Director, I contributed across key parts of the redesign. I designed layouts for multiple screens and helped define the visual hierarchy for core UI components including the menu, calendar, and selectors. I also supported the evolution of the design system and overall product vision, and developed motion design patterns to bring consistency and clarity to interactions throughout the app.

Motion Design

Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to bring user-centered solutions to life. Passionate about refining and elevating digital experiences through thoughtful design and problem-solving.
